attributes.action: Allow President Mr Donald Trump a Full State Visit to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Whilst Mr Trump may be controversial , he remains a democratically elected head of state, and should be treated as such.
attributes.background: Mr Trump is the 45th President of the United States of America, he should be afforded the same respect as previous Presidents and be invited to the United Kingdom and afforded a full State Visit and be welcomed as both the Head of State of The United States of America and the President.
